scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:server && npm run lint:client
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm --prefix='./client' install && npm --prefix='./server' install
scripts.install:all-prod: npm install --production && npm --prefix='./client' install --production && npm --prefix='./server' install --production
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf ./client/node_modules && rm -rf ./server/node_modules && rm -rf ./client/build && npm --prefix='./server' run stop
